DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety Wuling San , traditional Chinese medicine , reduce arm volume excess woman stage I-II breast cancer related unilateral lymphedema .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Wuling San Breast Cancer-related Lymphedema
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator aim enroll 200 female adult patient ( age 20 40 year ) ethnicities/races , refer Fourth Affiliated Hospital Guangxi Medical University breast cancer related unilateral lymphedema . The investigator use standardize data collection form study , standard care practice patient place additional risk participate study . However , investigator collect data prospectively , participant sign consent .
DOC.criteria: Women complete primary adjuvant treatment ( surgery , chemotherapy , radiotherapy ) age 2040 unilateral BCRL , stage I II , BMI 1825 Volume difference â‰¥300 mL normal lymphedematous upper extremity base perometry evaluation No evidence breast cancer recurrence At least 6 month postoperative axillary lymph node dissection Bilateral lymphedema stage III lymphedema History bilateral axillary lymph node dissection Recent history cellulitis affect extremity ( within last 3 month ) Recurrent breast cancer malignancy Current ( within last month ) use chemotherapy breast malignancy Current ( within last 3 month ) use radiation breast malignancy Recent ( within last month ) current intensive MLD and/or short stretch bandage use Unstable lymphedema ( i.e . worsen symptoms/measurements past 3 month ) Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman Patients take drug like diosmin time enrollment , within 30 day . Use investigational drug time enrollment , within 30 day 5 halflives enrollment , whichever longer . Unable comply protocol , measurement followup schedule .
